main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQuery] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDrillThroughQuery]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQuery]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQuery] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQuery]( [DTQueryID] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [DTQueryName] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [DTQueryDesc] [nvarchar](200) NULL, [CriteriaTableTypeCode] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [IsEnabled] [bit] NOT NULL, [DTQueryXML] [xml] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DrillThroughQuery] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DTQueryID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
